sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Office of Consumer Services Information Act.

sections.heading: Definitions.) When used in this Act, unless the context otherwise
sections.text:
requires: "Agency" means the Office of Consumer Services established under
the authority of Executive Order Number 3-1976.

sections.heading: Any person or organization, public or private, submitting an
sections.text:
application to the agency for a grant of public funds, shall include in such
application, or as an attachment thereto, all information deemed necessary by
the agency.
